# New Feature

prd.of.feature.prompt.md
→ review PRD
→ /prompt prd.to.implementation
→ /prompt ralph.greenfield
→ /prompt ralph.pipeline

# Enhancements/Bug-fixes

prd.of.feature.prompt.d (MODE=ENHANCEMENT or BUG_FIX)
→ review PRD
→ /prompt prd.to.implementation
→ /prompt ralph.brownfield
→ /prompt ralph.pipeline
